Question: Dongguan Sifangge Electronic Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Dongguan Disheng Technology Electronic Co.,Ltd

Product: Mobile screen protector, tempered glass, charger

- Specializes in mobile phone accessories manufacturing
- Offers high-quality tempered glass screen protectors, chargers, earphones, and data cables
- Provides OEM/ODM manufacturing service with international certifications such as ISO9001:2015, BSCI, GSV, ISO14001:2015
- Production bases in Dongguan, China, and Suksawat, Thailand
- Covers an area of over 6,000 square meters with more than 150 employees and over 30 professional QC and engineers
- Committed to innovation and providing competitive products and services
- Showcased latest innovative products and solutions at CES 2024 exhibition booth 53771
- Offers a wide range of groundbreaking technologies and engages in insightful discussions at CES 2024
- Located at Venetian Expo hall A booth 53771 during CES 2024 exhibition
Summary_cn:
东莞市迪晟科技电子有限公司

产品：手机屏幕保护膜、钢化玻璃、充电器

- 专注于手机配件制造
- 提供优质的钢化玻璃屏幕保护膜、充电器、耳机和数据线
- 提供具有ISO9001:2015、BSCI、GSV、ISO14001:2015等国际认证的OEM / ODM制造服务
- 生产基地位于中国东莞和泰国素叻瓦，总面积超过6000平方米，员工150余人，拥有30多名专业质检和工程师
- 致力于创新，并提供具有竞争力的产品和服务
- 在CES 2024展位53771上展示最新的创新产品和解决方案
- 在CES 2024展会上提供广泛的突破性技术，并进行深入的讨论
- 在CES 2024展会期间位于威尼斯人博览馆A馆53771展位
